snippet.title: Deep Dark Wrath | v0.9 Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Deep Dark Wrath is a hand-drawn, card collecting, dungeon-crawler where you fend off countless enemies and find its source with the help of powerful Enchanted Cards. Deep Dark Wrath is still in development for Windows PC and is planned to be released by mid-Q2 2024.

This gameplay trailer is mainly a quick showcase of the game for Steam and Itch.

◼️ Deep Dark Wrath Steam Page ◼️
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2891520/Deep_Dark_Wrath/
◼️ Deep Dark Wrath itch.io Page ◼️
https://craftedcircuitry.itch.io/deep-dark-wrath
◼️ My Tumblr for Latest Updates ◼️
https://www.tumblr.com/craftedcircuitry
